Why #SkillsAct? Because community colleges can play a stronger role in preparing job seekers for skills-based careers.
Why #SkillsAct? Because North Carolinians know more about what it takes to find a job in our state than Washington does.

Why #SkillsAct? HR 803 has 1 flexible Workforce Investment Fund to serve as a single source of support for workers, employers & job seekers.
